Name:
Eritrea
Francis Garnier
Fate:
Transferred to France 1948
Sunk as target ship 1966
Displacement:
2,165 long tons (2,200 t) standard
3,068 long tons (3,117 t) full load
Propulsion: 2-shaft diesel-electric, 7,800 hp diesel, 1,300 hp electric motors
Armament:
4 × 120 mm (4.7 in) guns (2 × 2)
2 × Vickers-Terni 40 mm/39 pom pom (2 × 1)
4 × 13.2 mm (0.52 in) machine guns (4 × 1)
Armour:
Deck: 25 to 32 mm (0.98 to 1.26 in)
Conning tower: 100 mm (4 in)
